name: Smash Brickz Pro
description:
Unwind with this classic breakout game! Smash Brickz is an addictive arcade puzzle game that will help you relax.

If you're smart, _and a little bit lucky!_, you'll watch the balls bounce until all the blocks are destroyed. This brickbreaker is both challenging and very satisfying!

How to play:
- Swipe or point with your finger to take aim
- Choose the best angle, aim for weak spots, release your balls and sit back!
- Break all the bricks without letting them hit the bottom

How to win:
- Bounce as many times as possible to create impressive combos and achieve new highscores
- Collect as many stars as you can and don't forget to claim your rewards!
- Be strategic to beat your friends and stay #1 on the leaderboards

Features:
- Wipe out all the obstacles and smash your way through hundreds of levels
- Discover new environments with specific game mechanics and special bricks
- Defeat unique mini-bosses and bosses during epic fights
- Unlock helpful power-ups and upgrade your skills as you progress
- Connect to Facebook to see your friends' progress

Smash Brickz is Free to Play and you can play it whenever you want.
